Condition.Comments: Check if key item #71 is in its default position. If not, add a trigger for doors 64 & 70 to avoid softlock for any non-purists if they need to go back.
Check if key item #42 is in its default position. If not, ensure it is visible and add a replacement item on the conveyor belt.

OnFalse.Comments: Add some ammo where the fuse used to be.

Mirrored.Comments: Moves door 62 so that it can open properly, otherwise Lara has to glitch through.
